success.alert_global: You will now be alerted when new threads are opened
success.no_alert_global: You will no longer be alerted when new threads are opened
success.alert_thread: You will now be alerted when the user replies to this thread
success.no_alert_thread: You will no longer be alerted when the user replies to this thread

errors.resource_exists: A {{ resource }} with that name already exists
errors.resource_not_found: The {{ resource }} you are looking for could not be found
errors.resource_too_long: The given {{ snippet }} needs to be {{ length }} characters or less
errors.no_guilds: Could not find any mutual guilds that are setup with this bot.
errors.no_guild: Could not find that guild. Are you sure you're still in it?
errors.no_thread: This does not appear to be a thread
errors.thread_deleted: Could not find the channel associated with this thread. This is most likely because an Admin deleted it, opening a new thread with your message.
errors.thread_creation: Could not create the needed thread channel. This is likely a miss-configuration caused by an Admin
errors.thread_exists: A thread already exists with this user
errors.dm_fail: Failed to send a DM to the user. This is most likely because they have closed their DMs
errors.no_member: Member is not currently in the server
errors.not_own_message: You are not the author of that message
errors.user_deleted: The user appears to have deleted their account
errors.message_deleted: Could not expose message, it was likely deleted
errors.dm_only: This command is meant to only be used in DMs
errors.no_content: Messages require content to be used as replies
errors.no_results: No server found, it's possible none have the bot set up
errors.reserved_name: That name cannot be used, as its reserved for internal purposes
errors.resource_limit_reached: You have reached the limit of {{ limit }} {{ resource }}s
errors.no_args: You need to provide at least {{ count }} arguments to use this command
errors.arg_conflict: You cannot provide both {{ first }} and {{ second }}
errors.bad_snippet_name: The name of your snippet cannot be used for slash command creation. Please try a different name

anon.name: anon
anon.description: Whether or not to send the message as anonymous - defaults to false

thread.reprompt: Just to make sure you don't get it wrong, please select the guild this message is meant to go to once more

content.name: content
content.description: The new content of the snippet

show.name: show
show.description: Show information about a specific snippet

close.name: close

time.name: time
time.description: The amount of time to wait before closing the thread

silent.name: silent
silent.description: Whether or not to send the farewell message to the user - defaults to true

close.no_scheduled_close: This thread wasn't scheduled to close
close.successfully_canceled: Successfully canceled the closing of this thread

anon.name: anon
anon.description: Whether or not to send the message as anonymous - defaults to false

edit.name: edit
edit.description: Edit a reply to a thread

id.name: id
id.description: ID of the reply you wish to edit

content.name: content
content.description: The new content of the reply

clear_attachment.name: clear-attachment
clear_attachment.description: Clears the attachment of the reply

block.name: block
block.description: Block the user from using ModMail

duration.name: duration
duration.description: How long this user should be blocked for

alert.name: alert
alert.description: Recieve alerts for the current thread, or whenever new threads are opened

user.name: user
user.description: The user to open a thread with

switch.name: switch
switch.description: Switch the guild your messages are intended for
switch.success: Succesfully switched to the given guild

modmail_channel.name: modmail-channel
modmail_channel.description: The channel your modmail threads should be going to

greeting.name: greeting
greeting.description: The initial message to send to the user when they open a new thread

farewell.name: farewell
farewell.description: The message to send to the user when a thread is closed

simple_mode.name: simple-mode
simple_mode.description: Whether or not to use the simple mode for ModMail threads

alert_role.name: alert-role
alert_role.description: The role to ping when a new thread is open

logs.name: logs
logs.description: View the logs for a user

user.name: user

id.name: id
